features.title: Key Features
features.description: HY-Motion 1.0 brings text-driven animation into the mainstream. Its advanced AI understands complex prompts to produce smooth 3D movements that can be directly used in games, films, and VR.

items.title: Lightning-Fast Generation
items.description: Generate complete character animations in seconds. HY-Motion‚Äôs optimized models run quickly even on standard hardware, enabling rapid iteration without long rendering times.

items.title: Physically Realistic Motion
items.description: Built with billions of parameters and reinforcement learning, HY-Motion ensures natural human movements. Weight shifts, balance and smooth transitions are modeled to eliminate common artifacts like foot sliding.

items.title: Extensive Action Library
items.description: Access 200+ built-in motion categories from walking and jumping to martial arts and dance. You can even chain actions with multi-step prompts for complex scenes or combat sequences.

items.title: Auto Retargeting & Export

items.question: What is HY-Motion and how does it work?
items.answer: HY-Motion 1.0 is a cutting-edge text-to-3D animation model developed by Tencent. Simply type a description of an action and it generates a corresponding human skeletal animation. Its billion-parameter transformer understands complex prompts (like combat moves or sports actions) and produces smooth, realistic 3D motion.

items.question: Is hy-motion.ai free to use?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free online playground demo. You only need an account to try it out. The demo has limited daily runs and a basic output resolution. Our Pro version (coming soon) will remove limits, add high-res exports and priority processing for power users.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to use it?
items.answer: No login is required for the free demo. You can start generating animations right away. Signing up for a free account will let you save animations and access more runs, but basic use doesn‚Äôt need any sign-in.

items.question: What kind of animations can I create with text?
items.answer: You can generate a wide range of human motions: walking, running, jumping, fighting, dancing, and more. The model knows 200+ action categories (including sports, combat, daily activities) and can chain multiple steps (e.g. "pick up object, wave, then sit"). Prompt in plain English or Chinese for best results.

items.question: How do I use the animations in my projects?
items.answer: After generation, you can download the animation in standard 3D formats (FBX, BVH, GLTF). The service automatically retargets motions to a neutral skeleton, making them easy to import into Unity, Unreal, Blender or other 3D tools. From there you can apply your own character rig.

items.question: Are the generated motions realistic?
items.answer: Yes. HY-Motion is trained on thousands of hours of motion data and fine-tuned with physics constraints. This means animations have natural weight shifts, no foot sliding, and accurate timing. In tests it produces much more lifelike motion than older demo models.

items.question: Can I use the animations for commercial projects?
items.answer: Absolutely. HY-Motion 1.0 is released under Tencent‚Äôs open-source license (Apache 2.0). You own the animations you create on our platform and can use them in games, films, or products without restrictions.

items.question: What languages are supported for text prompts?
items.answer: The model is trained on both English and Chinese data, so it handles prompts in either language. You can write simple or complex instructions in Chinese or English, and HY-Motion will generate the corresponding motion sequence.

items.question: Does it support facial expressions or finger movement?
items.answer: Currently, HY-Motion 1.0 focuses on full-body kinematics (Body Pose). It generates excellent gross motor movements (running, dancing, fighting) but does not yet support detailed facial blendshapes or intricate finger articulation.

items.question: Can I use the output in Unity or Unreal Engine?
items.answer: Yes. While the raw model outputs academic formats (BVH/SMPL), our platform offers a 'Pro' conversion layer. We automatically retarget the skeleton to match the standard Unity Humanoid or UE5 Mannequin rigs, so you can drag and drop the files into your game engine.
